info.description: API documentation for the Endeavour Health Common Interface Mechanism.
info.title: Common Interface Mechanism

get.description: Trace registered patients linked to a person.

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Person bundle, containing the person details and a number of ODS Patient details.

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description: Trace registered patients linked to a person.

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Person bundle, containing the person details and a number of ODS Patient details.

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description: Get Patient Demographic Record By ID

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Patient Resource - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description: Get Patient Demographic Record By NHS Number

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resource(s) - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description: Get Patient Demographic Records for All Patients

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description: Get Patient Demographic Records for All ACTIVE Patients

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description: Get Patient Demographic Records for All ACTIVE Patients that have had a record update since the date specified.

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: dateUpdated
parameters.description: Reference date after which the patient record was last updated

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

put.description: The subscription resource is used to define a push based subscription from a server to another system. Once a subscription is registered with the server, the server checks every resource that is created or updated, and if the resource matches the given criteria, it sends a message on the defined 'channel' so that another system is able to take an appropriate action.

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

400.description: Bad request - resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

404.description: Not found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

get.summary: Get clinical record by patient ID
get.description: This operation is used to return all the information related to the patient described in the resource on which this operation is invoked. Returns all resources that it has that are in the patient compartment for the identified patient, and any resource referenced from those, excluding binaries and attachments.

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of All Resources that are in the Patient Compartment for the identified patient. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient-operations.html#everything

get.description: Get Binary Document by Document ID

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Document unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Binary Resource - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/binary.html

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description: Get slots of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Slot Resources. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/slot.html

get.description: Get Patient Appointments By Patient ID
